meta.title: About FitConnect | UK Fitness Coaching Platform
meta.description: FitConnect connects gym-goers with verified personal trainers, nutritionists and coaches across the UK. Founded in 2025, available on iOS and Android.

hero.description: We believe everyone deserves access to world-class fitness coaching. FitConnect bridges the gap between ambitious individuals and the coaches who can help them achieve their dreams.

story.paragraph1: Founded in 2024, FitConnect was born from a simple observation: while incredible fitness coaches exist everywhere, finding the right match remains frustratingly difficult for most people.
story.paragraph2: Our founders, Sarah and Marcus, experienced this firsthand. Sarah, a former Olympic athlete turned coach, struggled to reach clients beyond her local gym. Marcus, a busy tech entrepreneur, couldn't find a coach who understood his schedule constraints and specific goals.
story.paragraph3: Together, they built FitConnect—a platform that uses smart matching technology to connect clients with coaches who truly fit their needs, whether that's a nutritionist for meal planning, a personal trainer for strength goals, or a boxing coach for stress relief.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.quoteEnd: for everyone, regardless of location, budget, or experience level.

valuesSection.description: These principles guide everything we do at FitConnect

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We partner only with verified, top-tier coaches who have proven track records of transforming lives.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Fitness coaching for every budget and schedule. Everyone deserves access to expert guidance.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building meaningful connections that motivate, inspire, and support your fitness journey.

results.title: Results
results.description: Data-driven approach focused on measurable outcomes and sustainable transformation.

teamSection.description: Passionate experts dedicated to revolutionizing fitness coaching

sarah.bio: Former Olympic athlete with 15 years in fitness industry

marcus.bio: Tech entrepreneur passionate about health innovation

emily.bio: Sports psychologist and certified strength coach

james.bio: Former personal trainer with 10K+ client sessions

trust.title: Your Trust, Our Priority
trust.description: Every coach on FitConnect undergoes rigorous verification including credential checks, background screening, and ongoing performance monitoring. We maintain the highest standards so you can focus on what matters—your fitness journey.

cta.description: Whether you're looking to transform your body, improve your health, or grow your coaching business, FitConnect is here to help you succeed.

quickLinks.findCoach: How do I find a coach?
quickLinks.becomeCoach: How do I become a coach?

meta.title: FAQ | Common Questions About FitConnect
meta.description: Find answers about finding coaches, booking sessions, pricing and payments. Everything you need to know about using FitConnect for fitness coaching.

hero.description: Everything you need to know about FitConnect. Can't find what you're looking for? Reach out to our friendly support team.

findCoach.question: How do I find the right coach for me?
findCoach.answer: Our smart matching system helps you find coaches based on your goals, budget, location, and preferred training style. Browse coach profiles, read reviews, and book a free discovery call to ensure it's a great fit before committing.

coachTypes.question: What types of coaches are available on FitConnect?
coachTypes.answer: We offer a diverse range of certified professionals including Personal Trainers, Nutritionists & Dietitians, Boxing Coaches, MMA Trainers, Yoga Instructors, and Strength & Conditioning Specialists. Each coach is verified and brings unique expertise to help you reach your goals.

cost.question: How much does coaching cost?
cost.answer: Coaching rates vary based on the coach's experience, specialty, and session type. Rates typically range from $30-$200+ per session. You can filter coaches by price range and many offer package discounts for multiple sessions.

cancel.question: Can I cancel or reschedule sessions?
cancel.answer: Yes! You can reschedule or cancel sessions up to 24 hours before the scheduled time at no charge. Cancellations within 24 hours may be subject to the coach's cancellation policy, which is displayed on their profile.

trial.question: Is there a free trial or introductory session?
trial.answer: Many coaches offer a free 15-minute discovery call to discuss your goals and see if you're a good match. Look for the 'Free Consultation' badge on coach profiles, or message coaches directly to inquire.

online.question: How do online sessions work?
online.answer: Online sessions are conducted through our integrated video platform. Simply log in at your scheduled time, and you'll be connected with your coach. You can train from home, your gym, or anywhere with a stable internet connection.

satisfaction.question: What if I'm not satisfied with my coach?
satisfaction.answer: Your satisfaction is our priority. If you're not happy after your first session, contact our support team within 48 hours for a full refund. We'll also help match you with a different coach who better fits your needs.

plans.question: Do coaches create personalized workout/meal plans?
plans.answer: Yes! Most coaches create customized plans based on your goals, preferences, and any limitations. The level of customization depends on the package you choose—discuss specifics with your coach during the discovery call.

become.question: How do I become a coach on FitConnect?
become.answer: Click 'Become a Coach' and complete our application. You'll need to submit your certifications, experience details, and complete a brief interview. Once approved, you can set up your profile and start accepting clients.

requirements.question: What are the requirements to join as a coach?
requirements.answer: We require: (1) Valid certification from an accredited organization in your specialty, (2) Minimum 2 years of professional coaching experience, (3) Passing a background check, (4) Professional liability insurance. Additional certifications strengthen your profile.

payment.question: How and when do I get paid?
payment.answer: Payments are processed automatically after each completed session. Funds are transferred to your connected bank account within 3-5 business days. You can track all earnings and pending payments in your coach dashboard.

rates.question: Can I set my own rates and schedule?
rates.answer: Absolutely! You have full control over your hourly rates, package pricing, and availability. Set your schedule, block off vacation time, and adjust rates anytime through your dashboard.

tools.question: What tools does FitConnect provide for coaches?
tools.answer: Our platform includes: client management dashboard, scheduling & calendar integration, secure messaging, video session hosting, progress tracking tools, workout/meal plan builders, payment processing, and marketing visibility.

fees.question: How much does FitConnect charge coaches?
fees.answer: We charge a 15% platform fee on each session. This covers payment processing, platform maintenance, marketing, and support. There are no upfront costs or monthly fees—you only pay when you earn.

clients.question: How do I get more clients on the platform?
clients.answer: Complete your profile with photos and detailed descriptions, respond quickly to inquiries, collect reviews from clients, and maintain a high rating. Featured placement is available for top-performing coaches.

hybrid.question: Can I coach both online and in-person?
hybrid.answer: Yes! You can offer online sessions, in-person sessions, or both. Simply indicate your preferences in your profile settings and specify your in-person service area.

security.question: Is my personal information secure?
security.answer: Yes, security is our top priority. We use bank-level encryption (256-bit SSL) to protect all data. Payment information is handled by Stripe, a PCI-compliant payment processor. We never share your personal information with third parties.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), Apple Pay, Google Pay, and bank transfers in select regions. All payments are processed securely through Stripe.

support.question: How do I contact customer support?
support.answer: You can reach our support team via email at {{email}}, through the in-app chat, or by phone during business hours (9 AM - 6 PM GMT). We typically respond to inquiries within 24 hours.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: Yes, we offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you're unsatisfied with your first session with a new coach, contact us within 48 hours for a full refund. Package refunds are prorated based on unused sessions.

availability.question: Is FitConnect available in my area?
availability.answer: FitConnect is available worldwide for online coaching! For in-person sessions, availability depends on coaches in your area. Enter your location in the search to see local coaches, or choose online coaching for maximum flexibility.

corporate.question: Can I use FitConnect for corporate wellness programs?
corporate.answer: Yes! We offer corporate packages for businesses looking to provide fitness coaching as an employee benefit. Contact our enterprise team at {{email}} for custom solutions and volume pricing.

cta.title: Still Have Questions?
cta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our friendly support team is here to help you with anything you need.

meta.description: Find experienced boxing coaches for fitness, technique or competition. Beginner-friendly training, pad work and sparring. Book your first session today.

hero.description: Train with experienced boxing coaches who teach proper technique, build your fitness, and help you achieve your goals—whether that's fitness, competition, or self-defence.

benefits.title: Why Train Boxing?
benefits.description: Boxing offers incredible physical and mental benefits for people of all fitness levels.

fullBody.title: Full-Body Workout
fullBody.description: Boxing engages every muscle group, burning up to 800 calories per session.

skills.title: Learn Real Skills
skills.description: Master proper technique from footwork to combinations with expert coaching.

selfDefense.title: Self-Defence
selfDefense.description: Gain confidence and practical self-defence skills that last a lifetime.

stress.title: Stress Relief
stress.description: Release tension and boost mental clarity through focused training.

featured.title: Top-Rated Boxing Coaches
featured.description: Train with experienced boxing coaches who know how to get results.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about boxing training.

experience.question: Do I need any experience to start boxing?
experience.answer: Absolutely not! Our coaches work with complete beginners through to competitive boxers. You'll learn at your own pace with proper technique from day one.

equipment.question: What equipment do I need?
equipment.answer: For your first session, just wear comfortable workout clothes and trainers. Your coach will provide gloves and pads. As you progress, you may want to invest in your own gloves and wraps.

safety.question: Is boxing safe?
safety.answer: Yes! With proper coaching, boxing is very safe. Beginners focus on technique, pad work, and fitness rather than sparring. Your coach will ensure you progress safely.

weightLoss.question: Will boxing help me lose weight?
weightLoss.answer: Boxing is one of the most effective workouts for weight loss and conditioning. Expect to burn 500-800 calories per session while building lean muscle.

results.question: How quickly will I see results?
results.answer: Most people notice improved fitness and coordination within 2-4 weeks. Noticeable body composition changes typically occur within 6-8 weeks of consistent training.

cta.title: Ready to Step in the Ring?
cta.description: Connect with a boxing coach today and start your journey.

benefits.title: Why Train MMA?

combat.title: Complete Combat System

conditioning.title: Elite Conditioning
conditioning.description: Build functional strength, explosive power, and combat-ready endurance.

selfDefense.title: Real Self-Defence

coaches.title: Expert Coaches
coaches.description: Train with coaches who have real competitive experience and proven teaching methods.

featured.title: Top-Rated MMA Coaches
featured.description: Train with coaches who have real fighting experience.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about MMA training.

experience.question: Do I need martial arts experience to start MMA?
experience.answer: Not at all! Many of our coaches specialise in beginner programs. You'll learn fundamentals safely and progress at your own pace. No prior experience is necessary.

training.question: What does MMA training involve?
training.answer: MMA training combines multiple disciplines including striking (boxing, Muay Thai), wrestling, and grappling (Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu). Your coach will create a well-rounded program based on your goals.

safety.question: Is MMA training dangerous?
safety.answer: With proper coaching, MMA training is very safe. Beginners focus on technique, conditioning, and controlled drilling. Sparring is optional and only introduced when you're ready.

fitness.question: Can MMA help with fitness and weight loss?
fitness.answer: Absolutely! MMA provides an incredible full-body workout. Many people train MMA purely for fitness, burning 700-1000 calories per session while building functional strength.

compete.question: Do I need to compete to train MMA?
compete.answer: No! Most MMA practitioners train for fitness, self-defence, or personal development without ever competing. Your coach will support whatever goals you have.

cta.title: Ready to Train Like a Fighter?
cta.description: Connect with an MMA coach today and begin your martial arts journey.

meta.description: Find your perfect personal trainer. Verified UK coaches offering bespoke workout plans, flexible scheduling and results-focused training. Sessions from £40.

hero.description: Work with certified personal trainers who create customised workout programs, keep you accountable, and help you achieve results faster than training alone.

benefits.title: Why Work with a Personal Trainer?
benefits.description: Personal training is the fastest way to reach your fitness goals with expert guidance every step of the way.

programs.title: Personalised Programs
programs.description: Custom workout plans designed specifically for your goals, fitness level, and schedule.

progress.title: Track Your Progress
progress.description: Monitor your improvements with detailed tracking and regular assessments.

guidance.title: Expert Guidance
guidance.description: Work with certified professionals who keep you motivated and accountable.

flexible.title: Flexible Training
flexible.description: Train online or in-person, at your convenience with flexible scheduling.

featured.title: Top-Rated Personal Trainers
featured.description: Discover highly-rated personal trainers ready to help you transform.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about personal training.

choose.question: How do I choose the right personal trainer?
choose.answer: Look at their certifications, experience, specialisations, and reviews from other clients. Our platform lets you filter trainers by expertise, location, and price range to find your perfect match.

cost.question: How much does personal training cost?
cost.answer: Prices vary depending on the trainer's experience and location. On FitConnect, you'll find trainers ranging from £30 to £150+ per session, with package discounts often available.

online.question: Can I train online with a personal trainer?
online.answer: Yes! Many of our personal trainers offer online coaching via video calls, custom workout plans, and messaging support. This is a flexible and often more affordable option.

frequency.question: How often should I train with a personal trainer?
frequency.answer: Most clients start with 2-3 sessions per week. Your trainer will recommend the optimal frequency based on your goals and current fitness level.

firstSession.question: What should I expect in my first session?
firstSession.answer: Your first session typically includes a fitness assessment, goal setting discussion, and introduction to basic exercises. Your trainer will create a baseline to track your progress.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Fitness Journey?
cta.description: Connect with a personal trainer today and take the first step towards your goals.

meta.title: Nutritionists UK | Expert Diet & Nutrition Coaches
meta.description: Work with qualified nutritionists for personalised meal plans, weight management and sports nutrition. Book a consultation with UK nutrition experts today.

hero.description: Work with qualified nutritionists who create personalised meal plans, help you build healthy habits, and guide you towards optimal health and performance.

benefits.title: Why Work with a Nutritionist?
benefits.description: Proper nutrition is the foundation of health, energy, and performance. Get expert guidance tailored to you.

mealPlans.title: Custom Meal Plans
mealPlans.description: Personalised nutrition plans designed around your goals, preferences, and dietary requirements.

weight.title: Weight Management
weight.description: Science-based approaches to achieve and maintain your ideal weight sustainably.

health.title: Health Optimisation
health.description: Improve energy, sleep, digestion, and overall wellbeing through proper nutrition.

dietary.title: Dietary Support
dietary.description: Expert guidance for special diets including vegan, keto, gluten-free, and more.

featured.title: Top-Rated Nutritionists
featured.description: Discover highly-rated nutrition experts ready to help you eat better.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about nutrition coaching.

difference.question: What's the difference between a nutritionist and a dietitian?
difference.answer: Both can provide excellent nutrition advice. Dietitians have protected titles and specific clinical qualifications. Nutritionists may have various certifications and often specialise in wellness, sports nutrition, or weight management.

weightLoss.question: How can a nutritionist help me lose weight?
weightLoss.answer: A nutritionist creates a sustainable, personalised eating plan based on your metabolism, lifestyle, and preferences. They help you understand portion sizes, meal timing, and make healthy choices without extreme restriction.

strictDiet.question: Do I need to follow a strict diet?
strictDiet.answer: No! Good nutrition coaching focuses on sustainable habits, not restrictive diets. Your nutritionist will work with your food preferences to create an enjoyable eating plan.

medical.question: Can nutritionists help with medical conditions?
medical.answer: Many nutritionists specialise in conditions like diabetes, digestive issues, and food intolerances. Always check your nutritionist's qualifications and consult your doctor for medical nutrition therapy.

frequency.question: How often should I meet with my nutritionist?
frequency.answer: Most clients start with weekly check-ins, then move to bi-weekly or monthly as they establish healthy habits. Your nutritionist will recommend the best frequency for your goals.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Diet?
cta.description: Connect with a nutritionist today and start eating for your goals.
